name: (05/12) Battle Ranger
description:
"Like Pokémon meets Power Rangers."

Turn based 3v3 battling. Select a team of three combatants out of a pool of 25 rentals, and used them against an enemy team of three. Use elemental advantages and disadvantages, strategic moves, and status boosting to get an edge in battle.

Month 5 of 12

  • Idea
  • Review

Controls

  • Plays with the mouse.

Built in Godot.
